Topic.Title: cant make a container that can close and open

Posts.EditableText: the container if i try to open a closed container it will say that its already open when it should say that i opened it because if i command it to close it will say its closed but it is still technically open any suggestions?
Posts.HTML: the container if i try to open a closed container it will say that its already open when it should say that i opened it because if i command it to close it will say its closed but it is still technically open any suggestions?

Posts.EditableText:
Have you created the closed container like this
Create object
Click on features at top.  Container will appear to right of features
Click on container 
Click on closed container ( there are other options, container, not container, surface.)
The container should work
